content: आदानं {@--1@} Taking, receiving, accepting, seizing; कुशांकुरादानपरिक्षतांगुलिः <ls>Ku. 5. 11</ls>; आदानं हि विसर्गाय सतां वारिमुचामिव <ls>R. 4. 86.</ls> {@--2@} Earning, getting. {@--3@} A symptom (of a disease). {@--4@} Binding, fettering (from आदा {c2c} <ab>P.</ab>). {@--5@} A horse's trappings. --नी <ab>N.</ab> of a plant हस्तिघोषा.
